attributes.action: Stop Michael Martin becoming a lord
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Speaker of Britain's House of Commons Michael Martin
Sack him or  promote to a lord with huge pension
"in the old days (before 1560), seven were beheaded” no pension for them and no Lordship
please vote to stop him coming a lord

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Queen.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
